m_szDocSumamry: Gates & Thiel Are Wrong On Energy, But Thiel Is More Wrong May 22nd, 2016 by Michael Barnard   The major causes of climate change and air pollution are the burning of fossil fuels for electrical generation and transportation. Bill Gates accepts that but thinks that technical solutions don’t exist already and need to be discovered. Thiel doesn’t even accept climate change, but still thinks we need to invest in disruptive innovation in energy.
